TextView.android:text: Every player will start to play from home with Rs. 750/- and has to return to home. In this game every player will enjoy his/her Holiday and while playing, any player may come on place from where he/she wins or loses money. There are few spots such as Dice Gambling where player has to try his/her luck. If the luck favours the player, the player gets money and if the player has bad luck, the player loses money. When a player lands on Dice Gambling, he/she must select two numbers between 1 to 6 (both exclusive). If the number on the dice corresponds to one of the selected numbers, he/she wins the given amount and loses otherwise. A player goes out of the game if he/she can't pay the required amount to the Bank or other players. When all players reach Home, the player with the highest amount wins the game, the player with the second highest amount becomes second and so on.
